title: The Falsely Exiled Strongest Cursebreaker, The Journey To Revive The Ancient Illusory Kingdom. ~The Cursebreaker King And The Princess Of The Abyss~
alternative_title: Nureginu de Tsuihousareta Saikyou Kai Noroishi, Maboroshi no Kodai Oukoku wo Saikousasete Musou suru ~Noroiyabu no Ou to Naraku no Hime~ ; 濡れ衣で追放された最強解呪士、幻の古代王国を再興させて無双する～呪破の王と奈落の姫～
status: Nureginu de Tsuihousareta Saikyou Kai Noroishi, Maboroshi no Kodai Oukoku wo Saikousasete Musou suru ~Noroiyabu no Ou to Naraku no Hime~ ; 濡れ衣で追放された最強解呪士、幻の古代王国を再興させて無双する～呪破の王と奈落の姫～
description:
Description :
        Alf, one of the kingdom's official cursebreakers, is sentenced and punished to be thrown into the abyss for crimes he did not commit. Before his very eyes lies a never-ending labyrinth... In this dungeon, that no one has ever escaped from, Alf meets a mysterious beauty!?The curtains open to the grandiose revenge story of a boy who lost everything after being betrayed by his own kind!!
